title: SBCD
description:
SBCD or Super boot CD is a bootcd that proceeds Hirens, Based on hirens sources, it has been completly revamped for the (U)EFI spec, beeing able to boot in secure boot mode, and beeeing able to repair MACS and windows machine.

Unfortunatly no longer on CD as most computers no longer come with DVD player, SBCD fits on a 8 GB flash drive, and has full support for old computer and new

The mini windows 10 environment has all the tools you need, and with every OS versions recovery PE built in can quickly repair windows or use tools for imaging, cloning, data recovery, secure erase.

Built by someone who works in the IT Home scale repair shop, I use this everyday and it hasn't failed me once, you mijght scoff about it size, but you can always remove stuff.

With the HBCDmenu all updated and including new programs, stress testing, virus scanning (portable malwarebytes, kaspersky, and other popular tools.

and if you need anything added, just ask on mypage,

I hope this helps you for anyone looking to move on from hirens to something more modern
